about_the_game:
“The Milliner” is a noir gunslinging metroidvania set in the oppressive and broken world of Anfransone. Explore a handcrafted, interconnected world full of mystery and melancholy, from crumbling cities to eldritch asylums. Engage in fast-paced combat that’s tightly interwoven with slick movement, where guns are as important for traversal as they are for combat. Unlock game-changing abilities as you delve deeper into Anfransone, each uniquely recontextualizing how you play. Watch your back, as a ruthless visionary known only as the Milliner will do everything in its power to stop you and all you stand for.

Features

World

Explore the handcrafted, interconnected world of Anfransone. Discover over 8 surreal and deadly areas, including crumbling cities, bleak snowscapes, and eldritch asylums. Anfransone is full of branching paths, so exploration is in the hands of the player!

Combat

In The Milliner, combat is movement. Each shot from your weapon knocks you backward, which can be used as a pseudo double jump! Enemies punish poor movement and positioning, so knowing where and when to move is key.

Movement

Movement in The Milliner is expressive and free-flowing. As you acquire new abilities, your moveset quickly snowballs into a powerful kit that can be used to cross entire rooms without ever touching the floor. Mastering the movement and learning its intricacies is a core part of the Milliner experience.

Bossfights

Over a dozen bosses are ready to challenge your skills. Bosses are tough, but fair: no RNG-dependent attacks, no unnecessary contact damage, and no minions to get in your way. Bosses test your skill, not your luck!

Equipment

An arsenal of guns and sidearms are at your disposal. Mix and match different guns and sidearms to create your ideal play style. Flamethrowers, snipers, hammers and lasers, there’s dozens of weapons and even more combinations to pick from!
